prompt: It will just make us fat and act silly

response: I don't feel like sitting at home

prompt: ' I suggest a walk over to the gym where we can play singsong and meet some of our friends

prompt: I hear Mary and Sally often go there to play pingpong.Perhaps we can make a foursome with them
prompt_arabizi: I hear Mary and Sally often go there to play pingpong.Perhaps we can make a foursome with them
